# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value and can significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
